instructions:
This sheet is for **Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game** by **West End Games(WEG)**, which uses the D6 pool system.

**Sheet Features:**
- can be used for 1E, 2E, 2E R&E, and REUP games
- Wild Die can be disabled
- [Player](https://wiki.roll20.net/SWD6#PC_Sheet), [NPC](https://wiki.roll20.net/SWD6#NPC_sheet) & Starship sheets
- Species, Skills & Force Power names have autosuggestions
- [Customization options](https://wiki.roll20.net/SWD6#Settings_Menu): hiding sections, show/hide GM rolls, disable/enable roll modifier popup before rolling 
**Full Sheet Instructions: [Star Wars D6](https://wiki.roll20.net/Star_Wars_WEG_D6_character_sheet)**
	- [Sheet Improvement To-Do/Wishlist](https://wiki.roll20.net/SWD6#Feature_Requests)
	- [Changelog](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/D6StarWars/CHANGELOG.md)

 Issues, Ideas & Questions can be sent to the [active editor](https://app.roll20.net/users/1223200)

useroptions.description: PC is the normal player sheet, NPC is a compact version of the player, Starship shows stat blocks for srships only, and Container shows only the Weapon/Armor/Equipment sections(which can be used as a Container or a Shop display).

If Wild Die isn't used, the last die wont explode or highlight critical successes/failures.
